item.description:
An open invitation from one of our members. Rose, of the West Hartford Over 40's Fun Bunch will be hosting this event. For info, read on...


I would like to show my appreciation to all the organizers and meetup members by throwing a summer party at my home.

Let's have a party "we don't want summer to end and let's dance on the deck party, that is".
Party takes place rain or shine. Please bring a dish to share and your own alcohol ,plus some.
I need grills and chairs... lawn games if you want!

Featured music will be provided by dj Dan, Extraordinaire!!!

Woo Hoo!!!!!! Come join us!

* EXACT LOCATION (WEST HARTFORD) AND PHONE NUMBER WILL BE DISCLOSED TO YES RSVPs ONLY BEFORE THE PARTY.
item.how_to_find_us: Address and phone number will be provided to yes RSVPs before the party...
item.name: An Invitation To Keep The Summer Going...Party at Rose's!
